title: (x) font Oracle logo - custom, various pointers {Rainer, Mike Y}
content:
I'm looking for the font used in the Oracle logo. A similar font would work too.  
Any suggestions anyone?

Thx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/oracle_6137.jpg)
author: ReneRutten

comments.content: Forum-search still works: [Oracle-thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230708/http:/typophile.com/node/36357). Interesting reading [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230708/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=22581), too.

Ray Larabie's [Good Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230708/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/136?text=ORACLE) is very similar, and could be easily tweaked to re-create this logo. Use the C to make the E, and taper the terminals. The R editing ought to be easy too.

- Mike Yanega
